description:
Cat`s Eye is the most notorious group of art thieves in Japan. No one knows their identities, but for most of Tokyo, the mystery only heightens their allure. To bumbling detective Utsumi Toshio, Cat`s Eye is a colossal pain in the neck. They outwit him and the rest of the police at every turn, making them look ridiculous. He would never dream of being in love with someone in Cat`s Eye. Except he already is.
Toshio has no idea that Cat`s Eye is actually his girlfriend, Hitomi Kisugi, and her sisters Rui and Ai. Running the Cat`s Eye Café next door to the police station, they bring "hiding in plain sight" to a whole new level. But thievery and romance are difficult to balance. Hitomi will need all the help she can get to stop Toshio from discovering her identity — especially when he starts having feelings for her alter-ego!

REGULAR.description:
Meet the Kisugi sisters, Rui, Hitomi and Ai. By day they run a cafe next door to the local police station where Hitomi`s boyfriend Toshio works. By night, they`re the art thieves known as Cat`s Eye - and Toshio is the detective on the case.
Source: crunchyroll

Cat`s Eye is forced to clear their name when a fight over ownership of the painting they plan to steal leads to the trio being framed for murder.
Source: crunchyroll

Ai`s friend claims to have a photo of Cat`s Eye for the school paper. If that`s not bad enough, she`s convinced that Hitomi is Cat`s and sticks to her like glue. Can Cat`s shake her off in time for their heist?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: うるさい小悪魔にご用心

REGULAR.description:
When Cat`s Eye and Lupin`s Bride target the same painting, the Kisugi sisters must go head to head with an international art thief who is not only more experienced than they are, but also may know something about their missing father.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 挑戦者[チャレンジャー]はパリの匂い

REGULAR.description:
Toshio gets a new partner in Detective Asatani. Young and talented, Asatani has no trouble working the Cat`s Eye case. She even has a suspect in mind: Hitomi. It`s going to take the creativity of all three Kisugi sisters to put her off the scent.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Night Flight Is a Dangerous Scent
Yakan Hikou wa Kiken na Kaori
夜間飛行は危険な香り

REGULAR.description:
There`s trouble in paradise when Toshio spoils a romantic moment with Hitomi worrying over Cat`s Eye`s next heist. Preoccupied with their fight and trying to work up the nerve to kiss Hitomi, catching Cat`s isn`t exactly the first thing on Toshio`s mind.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ちょっとだけ恋人気分

REGULAR.description:
Hitomi`s birthday plans are ruined when the serial bomber Toshio`s been chasing strikes a museum during her party. Toshio will go to any lengths to catch the bomber and make up with Hitomi, but he may not be able to pull it off alone.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ラブサインは華やかに

REGULAR.description:
Cat`s targets one of a set of paintings by an Italian master, but they get more than they bargained for when a foreign embassy also wants the paintings to unearth the clues to a Medici treasure they`re said to contain.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 遥かなるトットチーノ

REGULAR.description:
Toshio decides the only way to outwit Cat`s is to steal their target first. With their roles reversed, Hitomi and Toshio set out on a chase across Yokohama that ends at the bottom of a well. Now thief and detective must work together to escape.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: とってもおかしな大追跡

REGULAR.description:
Between forgeries, lecherous department store owners, and killer dogs, Cat`s Eye and Inunari Station have problems in spades. It`ll take plans set in motion by both thieves and police to pull off this heist and bring the corrupt businessman to justice.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ドッグフードはお好き

REGULAR.description:
Hitomi tags along when Toshio mounts a sting operation on an illegal mafia-run casino. Finding one of her father`s long-missing paintings in the lobby, Hitomi uses her wiles to try and win it back. But all is not as it seems.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: アメリカの危険な誘惑

REGULAR.description:
Hitomi awaits her big roulette game for her father`s painting aboard the Queen Scheherazade. Meanwhile, Rui infiltrates the ship by posing as a dancer and works to install herself as the dealer for Hitomi`s game. But who will Hitomi be playing?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ヨーロッパの華麗な誘惑

REGULAR.description:
Toshio has a chance to become an inspector, but in order to take the promotion he has to move away for a year. He asks Hitomi to come with him, but can either of them leave Cat`s Eye behind?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ne t`en va pas mon amour

REGULAR.description:
When Toshio and Asatani get kidnapped by the owners of Cat`s Eye`s latest target, an Egyptian gem called “Cleopatra`s Tear”, it`s up to Hitomi to save them.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: クレオパトラの身代金

REGULAR.description:
Rui goes undercover to get close to a millionaire art collector who`s recently purchased one of her father`s paintings. But when he decides to add Rui herself to his collection, stealing the painting is the least of Cat`s Eye`s problems.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 真夜中に翔べレオタード

REGULAR.description:
Cat`s is about to pull off a tricky heist, outwitting the security cameras at the bank where their latest target is guarded. But a power outage cuts off oxygen to the vault and puts Toshio and Hitomi in danger.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Monday Is the Time to Smile

REGULAR.description:
Toshio loses his confidence when Ai gets shot and a vigilante murders her shooter. Now Hitomi has to steal a painting from the killer and restore Toshio`s confidence all while avoiding becoming the next victim.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shinigami ni wa Juudan ga Fusawashii
死神には銃弾がふさわしい

REGULAR.description:
A routine heist goes sour when the detectives of Inunari Station prove unusually difficult to shake off. Cornered with nowhere to run, Hitomi and Ai`s only means of escape is to pose as pro wrestlers.
Source: crunchyroll

To steal the “Mongolian Hawk” Cat`s Eye has to infiltrate Inunari Station itself. Toshio and the chief are confident they can catch the thieves in the act. But what about the curse? And why are there two Asatanis?
Source: crunchyroll

It looks like Toshio and Hitomi will finally get a vacation. But their intimate road trip is interrupted when they pick up a pair of stranded teens who turn out to be copy-“Cat`s”, on the run from the police.
Source: crunchyroll

Hitomi is despondent when she loses a necklace from her father during her last job. After Toshio picks it up and tries to contact Cat`s to return it, Hitomi has to arrange a meeting with him - without actually meeting him face to face.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I Want to Meet You Just Once
一度だけあなたに会いたい

REGULAR.description:
Trouble abounds for Hitomi when the little girl she saves during a heist turns out to be Toshio`s cousin. Convinced she`s going to marry Toshio herself, Yukiko proves a major pain. Worst of all, she claims to remember Cat`s face!
Source: crunchyroll

History repeats and causes strife among the Kisugi sisters when Ai falls for the son of the director of the museum that houses Cat`s next target.
Source: crunchyroll

Hitomi and Rui steal the perfect gift for Ai, a recording their father made for their mother. But when a mistake puts it in the hands of a local DJ, Cat`s has to scramble to save Christmas before their secret is outed on national radio.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Santa Came Falling from the Sky
Santa ga Sora kara Futte Kita
サンタが空から降ってきた

REGULAR.description:
To steal the “Ice Queen” from a ski resort, Hitomi must contend with its owner`s pampered princess of a daughter who won`t give up her birthday present without a fight.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Quand la cloche sonne douze fois

REGULAR.description:
Cat`s set out to steal a painting from the reclusive president of a shady global syndicate by infiltrating his private island. But it turns out he has plans of his own, and this time Cat`s may find themselves in over their heads.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ルナン島より愛をこめて

REGULAR.description:
Outmaneuvered by Kaibara and forced to break into a military ship, Hitomi is plunged into a desperate situation that could cost her not only her own life, but those of Toshio and her sisters.
Source: crunchyroll

When Ai turns up after a job gone wrong with no painting, amnesia, and a band of assassins out for her head, Hitomi and Rui must jog her memory without letting a clueless Ai spill the beans about Cat`s to Toshio, who she now believes to be her father.
Source: crunchyroll

Barrista, thief, and...model? Hitomi has to pose as a model to steal a necklace from the catwalk in the middle of a fashion show. And when Asatani gets her teeth into Cat`s Eye, this job may turn out to be Hitomi`s final curtain call.
Source: crunchyroll

A local health club magnate who beats Cat`s to one of their father`s paintings turns out to be operating a ring of stolen art auctions, and he`ll literally kill to add the trio`s collection to his catalogue.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Athletic Club Smells of Death
アスレチックは死の匂い

REGULAR.description:
Slim Suspense, an international jewel thief, nabs Cat`s Eye`s next target, but when Toshio and Hitomi catch him in the act, he turns out to be more interested in stealing Hitomi`s heart than the gem.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: それはキッスで始まった

REGULAR.description:
Stealing the virtually unguarded “Purple Orpheus” seems like a walk in the park to Hitomi and Ai, but Rui`s suspicions prove well-founded when the entire museum turns out to be a trap.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Art Museum Is Full of Danger
美術館は危険がいっぱい

REGULAR.description:
The chief plots to make Toshio steadier by encouraging him to propose to Hitomi, but when Toshio`s first attempt falls flat, he becomes determined not to make another until he`s taken Cat`s Eye down a peg.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 標的[ターゲット]はプロポーズ

REGULAR.description:
Toshio has a hunch that he might find out Cat`s Eye`s identities if he investigates the works of art that they`ve stolen in the past.  Rui, Ai and Hitomi need to act fast before Toshio discovers the truth about Heinz!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 君はハインツを見たか?

REGULAR.description:
Toshio has discovered a painting named “Wind” that`s more than it seems.  There`s a picture of Japan hidden beneath the painting`s surface, and with it, Toshio intends to learn all about Heinz` past!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 暴け! キャッツの秘密

REGULAR.description:
Daigo is a wealthy man who owns a giant ship called the Mermaid, and inside he guards Heinz` painting by the same name.  Cat`s Eye targets the “Mermaid,” but little do they know that Daigo is targeting them!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: cat`s eye ifo file for subtitles

2778.name: slow when it comes to love
